name: Janken Party Paradise
overview: (translated from Japanese WiiWare page) Variety game where excitement is excited by Janken rules! Everyone knows, anyone can do it, everyone gets awesome! Variety game where everyone can get excited with Janken rules, it is "Janken Party Paradise"! Of course, even one person is full of fun elements! It is! Five games that anyone can enjoy! Every game is easy to enjoy because it is a rule of Janken (Mikumi). ¦ brain train sensation ?afterwards brain Toranjanken? ¦ necessary judgment power is required ?wearing it wearing a janken pon? ¦ reflexes say things ?mogodian snatching? ¦ believe in your intuition and win the winning streak Aim ?Renren Janken? ¦ Enjoy the back of the other party's fool ! Brain battle where the hands are numb [Jankenbatcard] Jankenbatcard is also capable of Wi-Fi battle. Collect cards and aim at the ranking top with original deck! It is! Every game can be enjoyed by one, of course, family, friends, and lovers! Which goddess of victory smiles is intuitive, minded!
